    This class represents a Car, including its main attributes that affect the time it takes to complete a lap in a race

      • completeLap

        public int completeLap(Race currentRace)
        Make the car race a single lap. The time taken to complete the lap is calculated by retrieving the average lap time and altering it, based on the state of the car.
        Returns:
        the time taken to complete this lap
